title: Bug 119807Repeat header doesn't work in birt pdf emitter.
description: Bug 119807Repeat header doesn't work in birt pdf emitter. Description:Repeat header doesn't work in birt pdf emitter.Steps to reproduce:1.
EB: Change table repeatHeader to false and preview in pdf again.Expected result:Repeat header property works.Actual result:Table header wasn't repeated no matter repeatHeader was set to true or false.
SR: New a report and insert a table containing data more than one page.2. Preview in pdf through birt pdf emitter.3.
